scripts.dev: rm -rf ./build && npm run manifest && webpack --mode=development --watch --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && npm run manifest && webpack --mode=production --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.pack: npm run build && cross-env BROWSER_ENV=chrome node pack.js
scripts.firefox:dev: rm -rf ./build && npm run firefox:manifest && webpack --mode=development --watch --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.firefox:build: rm -rf ./build && npm run firefox:manifest && webpack --mode=production --config config/webpack.config.js
scripts.firefox:pack: npm run firefox:build && cross-env BROWSER_ENV=firefox node pack.js
